r.s: Decode and Encode data in Bittorrent format
r.d: This package consists of thre classes which handles the encoding and decoding of data in Bittorrent format. You can also extract useful informations from .torrent files and create .torrent files.
r.n: Removed UTF-8 de- and encoding. Added File_Bittorrent_MakeTorrent which creates .torrent files.
